snippet: Clayton Lockett was shocked with a Taser, slashed his own arm and had a catheter inserted in the hours leading up to a botched execution attempt, according to a detailed timeline.
abstract: Department of Corrections provides newly detailed account of Oklahoma execution of Clayton Lockett, as it reels from questions about its procedures and training of personnel as well as its secret sources of lethal drugs; timeline shows Lockett was shocked with Taser, slashed his own arm and had catheter inserted in hours leading up to botched execution attempt.

byline.original: By ERIK ECKHOLM and JOHN SCHWARTZ
byline.contributor: Erik Eckholm reported from McAlester, and John Schwartz from New York.

lead_paragraph: Clayton Lockett was shocked with a Taser, slashed his own arm and had a catheter inserted in the hours leading up to a botched execution attempt, according to a detailed timeline.

headline.main: Timeline Describes Frantic Scene at Oklahoma Execution
headline.print_headline: Timeline Describes Frantic Scene at Execution
